# WireMock Instructions

Wiremock is a library for stubbing and mocking web services. It is used to simulate HTTP-based APIs for testing purposes.

## Usage

Use GitHub MCP to retrieve the wiremock documentation and source code at:

- [Documentation Root](https://github.com/wiremock/wiremock.org/tree/main/src/content/docs/dotnet)
- [DotNet Source Code](https://github.com/wiremock/WireMock.Net)
